alert.note: Alert for Coleman; Runnels (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 4:09PM CDT until June 17 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Coleman County in west central Texas... Southeastern Runnels County in west central Texas... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 408 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Leaday, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Voss around 425 PM CDT. Gouldbusk around 440 PM CDT. Santa Anna around 515 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Mozelle, Shields and Fisk. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
